quote: God Doesn'T Require Us To Succeed, He Only Requires That You Try.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Age is whatever you think it is. You are as old as you think you are.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: A Man Who Won'T Die For Something Is Not Fit To Live.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: To fight against the infidels is Jihad; but to fight against your evil self is greater Jihad.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: A man's worth depends upon the nobility of his aspirations.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: This is a subtle truth. Whatever you love, you are.
author: Rumi

quote: There's no one with intelligence in this town except that man over there playing with the children, the one riding the stick horse. He has keen, fiery insight and vast dignity like the night sky, but he conceals it in the madness of child's play.
author: Rumi

quote: May Allah have mercy on him who sends me my faults as a present.
author: Umar ibn Al-KhattƒÅb (R.A)

quote: When The Going Gets Weird, The Weird Turn Pro.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: When Everything Seems To Be Going Against You, Remember That The Airplane Takes Off Against The Wind, Not With It.
author: Henry Ford
